## Description
 Mix flour with water and knead to form dough. Heat paste into flat sheet.&#10;&#9;&#9; cut sheet into different thickness.

|Skill Level:|1|
|Tech Level:|1|

|Work Level:|50.0 millisols|
|Power Required:|0.5 kW/hr|
